name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in building high-performance applications across the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, **React**, and **Express**. Experienced with database management using **MongoDB**, **Redis**, and **PostgreSQL**. Solid background in **Linux**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **GCP**, ensuring robust deployment of cloud-native systems. Adept in implementing **DevOps** practices, including **CI/CD**, **Automated Testing**, and version control with **GitHub**. Knowledgeable in security practices to ensure application compliance and integrity.

Skilled in both frontend and backend development with expertise in **FastAPI** and **Django**. Proven ability to develop AI/ML-powered platforms for predictive analytics and automation. Well-versed in compliance-driven development, aligning solutions with industry standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Strong background in MLOps and orchestration using tools such as **MLflow** and **Airflow**, ensuring efficient model training and deployment.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed full-stack applications utilizing **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, and **React (17–18)**, ensuring adherence to robust security practices across all platforms.
• Designed RESTful services and integrated with **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Redis** to facilitate efficient data management and CRUD operations.
• Implemented **Docker** containers for environment consistency and leveraged **Kubernetes** for orchestrating deployments, improving system reliability by **40%**.
• Automated CI/CD pipelines using **GitHub** Actions and **Docker**, achieving a **30%** reduction in deployment time through efficient release processes.
• Engaged in continuous automated testing using tools like Jest and Cypress, ensuring code quality and reducing bugs by **25%** through comprehensive test coverage.
• Enhanced system performance and monitoring with **Prometheus** and built logging mechanisms for error tracing and observability in production environments.
• Contributed to a culture of DevOps, advocating for best practices that included version control and continuous integration.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver all software components on schedule, maintaining a project success rate of **95%**.
• Conducted reviews of code and architecture to ensure compliance with security practices and performance standards, leading to a more efficient and secure codebase.
• Actively participated in Linux environment configuration and maintenance, ensuring optimal system performance and uptime.

• Leveraged **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) to modernize core financial platforms by migrating to microservices architecture, enhancing scalability and performance for high-volume transactional systems.
• Developed interactive front-end applications using **React** (v18), **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, integrating **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to create sleek, responsive interfaces for financial tools and admin panels.
• Delivered real-time analytics dashboards with **React** and **D3.js**, complemented by **Power BI Embedded** to provide operations teams with instant insights into transaction patterns, enhancing decision-making.
• Engineered an event-driven architecture utilizing **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus** for robust asynchronous communication across payment workflows, alerts, and compliance with a 99% uptime.
• Developed ETL pipelines for financial data ingestion from internal and third-party sources using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, supporting both batch and real-time processing to handle over **1M** transactions daily.
• Built and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection utilizing **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, enabling proactive detection of suspicious activities based on behavior and transaction patterns.
• Created machine learning pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, utilizing **MLflow** and **Airflow** to seamlessly integrate model inference into backend services.

Engineered robust backend services for a global e-commerce platform leveraging **Node.js** (including **Express**), **JavaScript**, and **TypeScript**, ensuring high availability and low latency, effectively managing crucial modules such as checkout and order fulfillment.
Optimized database interactions through **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Redis** to ensure fault-tolerant data access and improved application performance, handling up to **10,000** concurrent users.
Implemented continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD) pipelines with **Docker**, ensuring smooth updates and efficient orchestration on **Kubernetes**, leading to a **50%** reduction in deployment time.
Employed extensive logging and monitoring solutions utilizing **Prometheus** to enhance system reliability and performance monitoring.
Executed comprehensive automated testing routines to maintain high-quality code standards, improving bug detection rates by **30%** before production.
Designed user-friendly frontend applications with **React** (v18) and integrated dynamic components to deliver engaging web experiences, conforming to mobile-first strategies.
Established DevOps best practices to streamline workflows and improve collaboration between development and operations teams, resulting in a **40%** improvement in deployment frequency.
Applied security practices such as role-based access control (RBAC) and OAuth 2.0 to protect user data and ensure regulatory compliance, achieving **100%** adherence to GDPR requirements.
Leveraged cloud services on **GCP** to improve scalability and resource allocation, effectively managing resources based on traffic demands.
Collaborated in an Agile environment, participating in sprint planning and retrospectives to continuously improve processes and product quality.
